about_the_game:
WELCOME TO THE OTHER SIDE!

In this mini-campaign, you're dead. You kicked the bucket. You're six feet under. And now you're a restless spirit stuck in limbo.
This is a rare opportunity, as very few souls become spirits after they die, and even fewer get a second chance to right their wrongs.

YOU THOUGHT BEING ALIVE WAS TOUGH? TRY BEING DEAD!

Limbo is a realm where spirits can hang out, create art, gossip, practice forbidden magic, succumb to insanity, and steal each other's souls.
Unlife, just like life, can be harsh and cruel. Souls equal power, and in the eyes of evil spirits, everyone has a valuable soul waiting to be harvested.
Freeing your spirit from limbo is no easy challenge (especially if you rack up too many despair points), but before you can ascend and free your spirit, you have to take care of unfinished business in the living realm.

MISCHIEF FROM BEYOND THE GRAVE!

-Travel to the living realm and possess mortals.
-Different ghost types, each with their own unique magic.
-Meet spirits from all walks of the multiverse.
-Fight centuries-old evil spirits.
-Discover how you died, take care of unfinished business or fall into eternal despair.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: violence, blood and gore, use of drugs and alcohol, strong language, suggestive themes, general mature content.
